RESET_BLACKLIST_CONFIRM_TEXT.message: Are you sure you want to delete the blacklist (this cannot be undone)?

ADD_URL_PROMPT_TEXT.message: Enter the url or domain name (or comma separated list) to blacklist.

REMOVE_URL_PROMPT_TEXT.message: Enter the url or domain name (or comma separated list) to remove from the blacklist.

CHANGE_BLACKLIST_TYPE_NONE_CONFIRM_TEXT.message: Choosing 'none' for encryption type means that anyone who can open this page can see your blacklist in plain text (not recommended). This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be unencrypted?

CHANGE_BLACKLIST_TYPE_SHA1_CONFIRM_TEXT.message: This action will encrypt your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be encrypted using SHA1 (this cannot be undone)?

CHANGE_BLACKLIST_MATCHING_DOMAIN_CONFIRM.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on domains?

CHANGE_BLACKLIST_MATCHING_SUBDOMAIN_CONF.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on subdomains?

CHANGE_BLACKLIST_MATCHING_URL_CONFIRM_TE.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on URLs?

ENABLE_BLACKLIST_COOKIES_CONFIRM_TEXT.message: This action will enable the removal of cookies belonging to blacklist entries upon session end (read: tab closed, window closed, and 'Block' actions). Many sites rely on cookies for detecting whether users are logged in, among many other features.

IMPORT_BLACKLIST_PROMPT_TEXT.message: Enter a comma-separated list of hashes to import.
